title: SURE Guided Posterior Sampling: Trajectory Correction for Diffusion-Based Inverse Problems
summary: Diffusion models have emerged as powerful learned priors for solving inverse problems. However, current iterative solving approaches which alternate between diffusion sampling and data consistency steps typically require hundreds or thousands of steps to achieve high quality reconstruction due to accumulated errors.
